common.cleartext: A non-empty string indicates that the file is in clear text (not encoded).
common.version: ACE Direct Version number for display only. This release is: 2.1
common.year: The Copyright year for display only. The year is: 2018
common.debug_level: Logging level: ALL TRACE DEBUG INFO WARN ERROR FATAL OFF
common.fqdn: Fully qualified domain name of this server
common.private_ip: Private IP address of this server

https.certificate: Full path to the certificate file
https.private_key: Full path to the private key file

proxy_server.proto: protocol (e.g., wss) of SIP proxy server
proxy_server.port: port number of SIP proxy server, (e.g., 443)

signaling_server.proto: (if no nginx) protocol (e.g., wss) of signaling server
signaling_server.public: (if no nginx) FQDN:port of signaling server
signaling_server.port: (if no nginx) port number of signaling server
signaling_server.dev_url: (preferred) nginx path of personal signaling server (DEV) or empty string (PROD)

media_server.comment1: location of privacy video file on the Kurento media server

sip.public: Fully qualified domain name of the Asterisk server
sip.private_ip: Private IP address of the Asterisk server
sip.stun: Fully qualified domain name of the stun server
sip.turn: Fully qualified domain name of turn server
sip.turn_port: string; port number of turn server; may be empty

complaint.number: Asterisk dial-in number for the complaint queue

videomail.number: Asterisk dial-in number for the videomail queue

videomail.max_record_secs: Maximum time (seconds) for a video mail
videomail.outbound_timeout_secs: Integer; maximum seconds to wait for outbound videomail server to respond

missed_calls.max_missed_calls: Number of consecutive missed calls before forcing the agent to Away status

json_web_token.encoding: Encoding scheme for the JSON web token
json_web_token.secret_key: Unique string key for the JSON web token

session.secret_key: Unique string key for the session

mysql.host: Private IP address of the ACE Direct MySQL server
mysql.port: Port number for the ACE Direct MySQL server
mysql.user: Username for the ACE Direct MySQL user
mysql.password: Password for the ACE Direct MySQL user
mysql.ssuser: (for signaling server) signaling server db user
mysql.sspassword: (for signaling server) signaling server db password
mysql.ssdatabase: (for signaling server) signaling server db name

redis.host: Local IP address of the Redis server: 127.0.0.1

mongodb.connection_uri: Mongo DB connection URI; leave blank to disable

complaint_redirect.active: Complaint portal redirect? true or false

popticket.url: URL of zendesk pop ticket; omit this field to skip zendesk pop

skinny_mode.agent: Enable skinny mode for agent portal: true or false
skinny_mode.consumer: Enable skinny mode for consumer portal: true or false

caption_mode.agent: Enable captions for the agent portal
caption_mode.consumer: Enable captions for the consumer portal

nginx.fqdn: Fully qualified domain name of this server
nginx.private_ip: Private IP address of the nginx server

openam.fqdn: Fully qualified domain name of the NGINX server
openam.private_ip: Private IP address of the NGINX server

ace_direct.https_listen_port: Port that the ACE Direct portal listens on

management_portal.https_listen_port: Port that the Management Portal listens on
management_portal.queues: Comma-separated values of the Asterisk queues
management_portal.poll_interval: Poll frequency (seconds) of the Management Portal statistics
management_portal.force_logout_password: a really secure password for the remote force agent logout feature

zendesk.private_ip: IP address of the zendesk/fendesk server
zendesk.port: Port number of the zendesk/fendesk server
zendesk.protocol: Use http for zendesk, https for fendesk
zendesk.user_id: email address of the zendesk user

acr_cdr.https_listen_port: Port that the ACR CDR portal listens on

user_service.port: Port number of the USERVER server
user_service.itrs_mode: Use ITRS to verify numbers? true|false

agent_service.port: Port number of the ASERVER server

agent_chat.save_agent_chats: boolean string (true/false) that enables or disables saving the agent chats to MongoDB

agent_incall_audio.mute_all_audio: boolean string (true/false) that enables or disables muting the agent audio at the beginning of a call

busylight.enabled: boolean string (true/false) that enables or disables the busylight in ACE Direct
busylight.awayBlink: boolean string (true/false) that enables blinking while Away, if callers are in queue

translation_server.private_ip: IP address of the translation server
translation_server.port: Port number of the translation server

webserver.port: Integer; port number of signaling server web server
webserver.csr: full path to asterisk csr file

filesharing.virus_scan_enabled: Virus scan will be enabled if set to 'true' but clamdscan must be set up on the machine for it to work.
